courseDescription:
With the advent of eCommerce, the need to make new websites has grown exponentially. People use the internet more than ever before, especially with the onset of the COVID-19 pandemic. It is now commonly understood that developing websites is a crucial skill. When it comes to website development, people usually look for accessible platforms on which they can build their websites with feasibility and ease. Although many such platforms exist, none are as reliable as WordPress. With this in mind, the website experts at Digital Partner have prepared this concise and comprehensive course that includes all the fundamental and essential aspects of building a website using WordPress. 

Starting with a brief introduction to WordPress, the course compares the advantages and disadvantages of WordPress.com and WordPress.org. It considers these platforms as the most influential platforms while building a website. This course contains two modules and provides well-documented training material in all its topics. Explore the method of working with a WordPress site in ten basic steps. The topics will demonstrate the step-by-step process of WordPress installation on both localhost and live server. Similarly, they will discuss the critical aspects of WordPress management: submission of WordPress to search engines, adding the meta tag to the site, using the method of plugin search for plugin installation, manual installation of WordPress and the uninstalling process of WordPress.

The course will help you to comprehend various aspects of the WordPress dashboard: WordPress pages, WordPress posts, customization, widgets, navigation menus and custom links. It teaches you to add and remove widgets from the sidebar and how to create the navigation and dropdown menus. The primary motive for this easy-to-follow course is to make the concept of learning WordPress easy for any beginner. So take the opportunity and enrol in this course today!
